about_the_game:
Powered by Unreal Engine 4, Redaction is the first FPS game mode of a larger project: Warscape. Set in the near-future, in a war-sundered and irradiated society divided by conflicts on multiple fronts, Redaction tasks players with joining an elite threat identification and elimination squad.

Dive into fast-paced, squad-based PVPVE FPS combat against mutated bugs, irradiated and mutated humans, and other teams of players. Choose a squad role and support your team with specialized utility items. Loot your way through the map completing objectives and defeat the stage boss to get extra loot.

Redaction is currently in its Alpha development phase. MI Studios aims to release Redaction via Steam Early Access soon. If you’re interested in testing Redaction in this early form prior to Steam release, don't hesitate to reach out to us through Discord. The address is available via the MI Studios website.

name: Warscape: Redaction

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 11520 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel or AMD, 3 GHz
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 11520 MB available space

short_description: Redaction is a thrilling 4-person FPS squad-based PVPVE looter shooter set in a post-apocalyptic dystopian world, driven by the powerful Unreal Engine 5. With Early Access set to launch in early 2025, make sure to add Redaction to your wishlist to receive complimentary starter items on release day.
